snippet: An extravagant townhouse on Central Park West that retains its fanciful 1887 Queen Anne exterior, but received a rigorous renovation in 2006, is poised to return to the market.
abstract: Extravagant townhouse at 247 Central Park West that retains its fanciful 1887 Queen Anne exterior, but received a rigorous renovation in 2006, is poised to return to the market at $27.75 million.
lead_paragraph: An extravagant townhouse on Central Park West that retains its fanciful 1887 Queen Anne exterior, but received a rigorous renovation in 2006, is poised to return to the market.

headline.seo: Townhouse on Central Park West for $27.75 Million
